title: The One That Got Away PT 4: She Wants To Reconnect With A Guy From 5th Grade?!
description:
Erin, a Bert Show listener, emailed us asking us to contact a guy she had a crush on in fifth grade. She’s 32 years old and has had her fair share of failed relationships. She recently ended things with her long-term boyfriend and thinks that now she is ready to start dating again.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
